TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Tqwiy, title = Tqwiy, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tqwiy} }

S.FORM: alang Tqwiy ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 59 buwan, 184 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 91% kyan ku 167 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 9% kyan ku 17 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 88%, Amis 2%, Cou 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Tqwiy hya' ga llyung. tay 'zil na Tqwiy hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Tqwiy hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Tqwiy hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Tqwiy hya' ga Ngurus. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Tqwiy ga niya mki sko Toweng si ato Hosing Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 59 bowan, 184 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 91% kyan ko 167 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 9% kyan ko 17 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 88%, Amis 2%, Coo 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ro kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Tqwiy hya' ga llyong. tay 'zil na Tqwiy hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Tqwiy hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Tqwiy hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Tqwiy hya' ga Ngoros. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
